channel.title: New magic menu

item.title: New magic menu
item.dc:creator: @qw3rty qw3rty
item.description:
@qw3rty wrote:

so i was making my magic menu i added the sprites and the stuff in the class9 but i cannot figure out how to add the client side stuff can some one tell me how to find the spell id?
such as belowâ€¦

if (spellID == 19809) [br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 22, 2008, 05:41:55 pm[/size][hr]which is the Spell id?

        class9 = aClass9Array210[19808] = new Class9();
